languages.text: {n}Хрипло вздохнув, Нихель мрачно смотрит на Паскаля:{/n} "Это ему решать".
{n}Nihel rasps a sigh and gives Pasqal a look of despair.{/n} "The decision is his to make."
languages.original_text: {n}Хрипло вздохнув, Нихель мрачно смотрит на Паскаля:{/n} "Это ему решать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Nihel sighs raspily and gives Pasqal a gloomy look.{/n} "The decision is his to make."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

traits.locale_text: {n}Nihel sighs raspily and gives Pasqal a gloomy look.{/n} "The decision is his to make."

languages.text: {n}ニヘルはため息のような音を吐きだすと、失望のまなざしでパスカルを見る。{/n}「決断は彼が下す」
languages.original_text: {n}Nihel rasps a sigh and gives Pasqal a look of despair.{/n} "The decision is his to make."

traits.locale_text: {n}ニヘルはため息のような音を吐きだすと、失望のまなざしでパスカルを見る。{/n}「決断は彼が下す」
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}妮赫尔叹了口气，绝望地看了帕斯卡一眼。{/n}“决定权在他之手。”
languages.original_text: {n}Nihel rasps a sigh and gives Pasqal a look of despair.{/n} "The decision is his to make."

traits.locale_text: {n}雅珀叹了口气，绝望地看了帕斯卡一眼。{/n}“决定权在他之手。”
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}Nihel laisse échapper un râle tout en regardant Pasqal avec désespoir.{/n} « La décision lui revient. »
languages.original_text: {n}Nihel rasps a sigh and gives Pasqal a look of despair.{/n} "The decision is his to make."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nihel laisse échapper un râle tout en regardant Pasqal avec désespoir.{/n} « La décision lui revient. »
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}Nihel exhala un suspiro y mira a Pasqal con un gesto de desesperación.{/n} «Es él quien debe tomar una decisión».
languages.original_text: {n}Nihel rasps a sigh and gives Pasqal a look of despair.{/n} "The decision is his to make."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nihel exhala un suspiro y mira a Pasqal con un gesto de desesperación.{/n} «Es él quien debe tomar una decisión».
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}Nihel seufzt krächzend und blickt Pasqal verzweifelt an.{/n} "Das ist seine Entscheidung."
languages.original_text: {n}Nihel rasps a sigh and gives Pasqal a look of despair.{/n} "The decision is his to make."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nihel seufzt krächzend und blickt Pasqal verzweifelt an.{/n} "Das ist seine Entscheidung."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}Nihel, gıcırtılı bir iç çekip Pasqal'a ümitsiz bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Karar ona ait."
languages.original_text: {n}Nihel rasps a sigh and gives Pasqal a look of despair.{/n} "The decision is his to make."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nihel gıcırtılı bir iç çekiyor ve Pasqal'a ümitsiz bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Karar ona ait."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
